ygData.subject: Re: Stun/root
ygData.msgSnippet: At level 60?  How does anyone know what this song does at level 60?  I ve never even seen someone who knew the formula that figures out the effects.  Not
ygData.messageBody:
At level 60? How does anyone know what this song does
at level 60? I've never even seen someone who knew
the formula that figures out the effects. Not saying
it is wrong either, but heck I figure John would know
the formula if anyone, and it looks like he doesn't.

Thex Luteslinger(Tunare)
37th level bard

> Message: 11
> Date: Thu, 9 Mar 2000 18:25:42 -0000
> From: Gary Johnston <garyj@...>
> Subject: RE: Stun/root
>
> From Eqcaster.
> At level 23 the slow down effect is 53%
> At level 60 the slow down effect is 90%
> Decrease Atk spd by 16% at lvl 23 and at lvl 60 by
> 35%
>
> Of course these values could be wrong but I doubt
> they are.
